subject: Horse Racing
Preakness Stakes
California Chrome (Race Horse)
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: Carolyn Coburn helped develop her husband’s interest in horse racing before they got married and became part of the ownership group of California Chrome, the Kentucky Derby winner.
snippet: Carolyn Coburn helped develop her husband’s interest in horse racing before they got married and became part of the ownership group of California Chrome, the Kentucky Derby winner.
